ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 572
ygData.msgSnippet: I will just trow in my equipment aswell: Head:     Bronze helmet (woodelf = Im walking around with a Birdie on my head!) Face:          Bronze mask Neck:
ygData.messageBody:
I will just trow in my equipment aswell:
Head: Bronze helmet (woodelf => Im walking around with a Birdie on my head!)
Face: Bronze mask
Neck: Spiked collar (+3str +3dex)
Ears: Gold saphire earring and something else dont remember offhand...
Shoulders: Bloodstained Mantle
Back: Cloak of icebearg (I think so the one of Martar in Everfrost)
Arms: Lambent wambrace
Bracer: Electrum jaded bracer +4cha
Bracer: Lambent bracer
Fingers: 2x Fire Emerald Silver rings (3str 3dex)
Chest: Small Bronze Breastplate
Legs: Lambent Greaves
Feet: Small bronze boots
Hands: Elf hide gloves mostly or shin gauntles
Waist: Thick leather apron.

Silvery Waraxe (Primary)
Dragoon Dirk (secondary or range when using instruments.. Which is almost always
when soloing and getting more and more common when in groups)

Handdrum, Mandolin, Mino horn, Horn
My current wishlist:
- MM Drum. I should be able to raise the 500-600pp people are demanding for
it...
- Any other instrument which is out of the ordinary.
- A new head piece.... Looks are everything. .Preferably something with charisma
bonuses.
- New boots............ See above..
- Mask of the deciever.. A bard got have this IMO.

All in all I consider my self ok equipped..
The missing lambent pieces:
- BP
- Boots
- shoulder
- gauntlets
- Helmet
I have put off for now. As I need to get a few levels before I am able to get
the items for them.

Musiker Silverdrum, Woodelf bard of the 25th level, bertox.
<Guardians of the Divine Light>
